div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: ON-PREMISES NETWORK - INTERNAL CONNECTIVITY (Via Virtual IP - Private)

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p: INTERNET - EXTERNAL CONNECTIVITY (Via Elastic IP - Public)

span.p:
SBC #2 (STANDBY)
Ready to take over on failure

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
VPC Route Table points VIP to Active SBC
(Updated on failover)

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
Downstream SBCs
Sites with local endpoints

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Regional SIP Provider (AU/US)
Local carrier via MPLS/DC

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: nowrap; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;
display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
All internal entities connect to the SAME Virtual IP (169.254.64.x)
They are unaware of which physical SBC is currently Active
